line.originaltext: 1 1/2 cups broccoli florets
1 1/2 cups cauliflower florets
1 green bell pepper, cut into 1 inch pieces
1 cucumber - peeled, seeded and chopped
1 carrot, coarsely chopped
1/4 cup Italian-style salad dressing
Bring a large pot of salted water to boil.
Bring a large pot of salted water to boil.
Bring a large pot of salted water to boil.
Bring a large pot of salted water to boil.
Bring a large pot of salted water to boil.
line.annotation: combine({ing50, ing51}, ing52, "salt water", "put salt into water")

line.originaltext: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil.
line.annotation: cook(ing52, t15, ing53, "boiling saltwater", "bring to boil")

line.originaltext: Place the broccoli and cauliflower florets into the boiling water for one minute.
line.annotation: combine({ing44, ing45, ing53}, ing54, "boiling vegetables", "in pot")

line.originaltext: Place the broccoli and cauliflower florets into the boiling water for one minute.
line.annotation: cook(ing54, t15, ing55, "cooked broccoli and cauliflower", "for one minute")

line.originaltext: Drain and rinse florets.
Drain and rinse florets.
line.annotation: do(ing55, , ing56, "dry cooked florets", "drain and rinse")

line.originaltext: Combine broccoli, cauliflower, bell pepper, cucumber, carrot and Italian salad dressing in a medium size mixing bowl.
Combine broccoli, cauliflower, bell pepper, cucumber, carrot and Italian salad dressing in a medium size mixing bowl.
line.annotation: combine({ing46, ing47, ing48, ing49, ing56}, ing57, "smeared vegetables in a bowl", "in the bowl")

line.originaltext: Combine broccoli, cauliflower, bell pepper, cucumber, carrot and Italian salad dressing in a medium size mixing bowl.
Cover the bowl and refrigerate the vegetables for one hour.
